text: The hardest thing I guess I just have to talk about this  it bothers me and I can t quite understand it  I hope I won t bother with my complaints To me the hardest thing about being stuck in depression for years is that vicious circle of self destruction There seems to be some force that moves me into thinking I don t need to care about getting out of it  this fatalism  which make me abandon everything worth fighting for in my life  and get more and more into a desperate situation I don t know if I depict it well enough for people to understand  but I feel like there s no reason trying to fight back and get back up  as my problems won t disappear even if I did What brings me a sense of closure I am satisfied with now is knowing I ll help those I love  in my last moments  dedicate in a sense these last few months to them and making their lives a little better happier That s the positive outcome I see and seek

text: came close todayI m going to make a long story short  I ve had so much stress and negative emotion bottled up these last few weeks  Today I had something great to look forward to  Today and tomorrow  wed  were supposed to be my little getaway  But all of my plans were ruined  Suddenly all of that stress and emotion was brought to the surface  Like the hay straw that broke the camel s back  It really is the little things that set you off  So I went to a parking lot and sat in my truck for about an hour and a half with my  mm ruger  I thought about shooting myself in my truck  It doesn t make me nervous or anything like it used to  I felt like I could just do it with no hesitation  I haven t really experienced that before  I normally wouldn t come this close to seriously doing it unless I had a panic attack  But today I just felt fed up  I sat in my truck messaging people I thought would help  Couldn t get anybody to reply  Unsurprising  I m just tired of the bullshit  And by bs I mean so many different things  Needless to say  I m really struggling right now  Of course I don t want to hurt my family by committing suicide  But I especially don t want to ruin Christmas for them forever like that  And that thought is all that brought me back home today  My will to just say  fuck it  is growing stronger though  I really don t want to live this life anymore and I m tired of waiting for that pish posh optimistic future everyone alludes to when they try to cheer me up  when someone is actually willing to even talk to me  It s not worth it to me anymore  I don t have anymore patience   I apologize  most of this was probably too vague  But I just want to put it out here on Reddit  my last resort that I often have to resort to  that I almost shot myself today  Nobody that knows my name and face outside of my family fucking cares  They will when it s too late though
summary: Today and tomorrow were supposed to be a getaway for me, but all of my plans were ruined. Today I sat in my truck for an hour and a half in a parking lot and thought about shooting myself. I don't want to hurt my family by committing suicide.
cleaned: today tomorrow suppose getaway plan ruin today sit truck hour half parking lot think shoot not want hurt family commit suicide

text: To memorialize being okay Thank you Suicide WatchI ve posted here a number of times  mostly when experiencing one of the worst darkest days of my life Don t get me wrong please  I spend most of my time being suicidal and philosophizing about suicide  purpose  and life itself  Most of the time  I want to drive over a cliff  jump in traffic or over a   high bridge  find heroin and have a peaceful death this is my norm But today  well today I woke up from a nightmare screaming  And yet I can say ATM im doing okay  I don t want to kill my self AT THE MOMENT  And this is a pleasant moment  one all suicidal people live for  I can play guitar and actually feel a tiny bit of pleasure  I can actually cognitively think before I talk and make jokes out of life situations  I can look at nature and see a true God if there ever were one  I can imagine and believe in a world in which I CAN LIVE  This feeling     of the population feel often  whee I feel rarely This will pass and I know that  darkness will come again  But I know there is light  there is purpose when I have the right chemical composition and belief system  I have to remember this This is for myself  but also for anyone who thinks it won t get better  It will  it just might not be the  better  that you want  But maybe we can pursue to grasp these moments and cherish them as if they were the only gift we were ever given I feel for you all  I will continue to come and post and to support those who need help  To share this moment of clarity in a world of consistent confusion and pain is I believe necessary  These moments will come  cherish them even knowing they will soon disappear I love you all and I m so sorry that we have to be here supporting each other  but I m glad we are despite that fact
summary: Suicide Watch is a support group for people who are thinking about suicide. Today, despite having a nightmare, I woke up from it and realized I don't want to kill myself. I will continue to post and support those who need help.
cleaned: suicide watch support group people think suicide today despite have nightmare wake realize not want kill continue post support need help

text: EnoughI ve waited forever  But nothing good ever happens  Certainly not for lack of trying  God knows I ve tried hard enough   Whenever something takes a slightly better turn  some devasting  life changing  soul crushing new event would happen  To destroy any grain of progress I ve made  To render my hard work absolutely pointless   I don t think I will actually commit suicide  perhaps I shouldn t have posted here  But I really really wish I could  The only reason I m alive is because I have elderly and ill parents  I feel like my only purpose on earth is to survive until they pass
summary: Nothing good ever happens to a person who tries hard enough. The only reason he's alive is because he has elderly and ill parents. He feels like his only purpose on earth is to survive until they pass. He doesn't think he will commit suicide.
cleaned: good happen person try hard reason alive elderly ill parent feel like purpose earth survive pass not think commit suicide
